text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulated Professions (Health and 

Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2021.

title: Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2021.
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) 
(Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 16 of 2020) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 60; 

(b) 

section 74 in so far as it is not already in operation; 

(c) 

sections 143 to 148; 

(d) 

sections 150 to 155; 

(e) 

(f) 

section 157; 

section 159 other than subsection (b) insofar as that subsection 
inserts (2A) into section 55 of the Act of 2011; 

(g) 

sections 160 to 185. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 July, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 3

title: Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 (Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2021.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 1st August 2021 as the day on which certain provisions of 
the Regulated Professions (Health and Social Care) (Amendment) Act 2020 
come into operation. 

The sections being commenced amend the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 
mainly in relation to registration and fitness to practise. 

The Order also commences sections which amend the Pharmacy Act 2007 in 
relation to membership of disciplinary committees and in relation to reports by 
authorised officers. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [409]
